name: Geometric pattern hood and silver grey super soft luxury faux rabbit fur.
description:
This hood is made from the most luxurious, soft faux fur. The colours are scrumptious together. Combing a deep piled best quality fur, in a silver grey colour with a dark grey root it also holds iridescent hues of pink and cream. This is exquisitely snuggabley seriously realistic fur. The outer is a wool mix duffel bag style fabric, with triangles and lines of woven thick threads. The colours are mainly dessert hues with a flash of sage green, black and white triangles, greys and browns

The hood is fastened at the collar bone with a substantial fur hook and eye, on top of that features two hand-covered buttons in the same fabric.

It is completely reversible if you wish. It can also be a really cozy scarf, just tucked into the neck of a jacket and left to fall at the back.

The hood is toasty warm and you feel completely glamorous in your winter wonderland.

One Size

thanks for popping in, Have a great day xx

name: Orange and cream Luxury faux fur Russian hat. Doctor Zhivago Hat
description:
One cosy size. Approx Sizing: 60cm / 23.5'' (circumference) 13 cm/ 5'' (depth)

Made from the most exquisite faux fur . Combing a deep piled best quality fur, the root is a bright ginger with cream and brown tips to add to its depth and realistic qualities with a black mix satin with glowing gold butterflies for the lining

Felling like a Russian princess and keeping warm at the same time, perfect!

Please remember the models head is small, so hat may appear smaller on you, thank you.


If you would like a custom sized hat made to your specific measurements, do no hesitate to convo me. Thank you.

name: Illustrated stag canvas cotton Bumbag, bag, fanny pack, leather, ykk zips, cotton lining
description:
Illustrated canvas cotton one compartment bumbag

Black YKK 7'' gold metal zip.

The front 1panels of the bag are made using printed canvas. The image is taken from an original ink Illustration that I made last December. 

Back and side wings are made from eco-leather. This is from a company that takes leather scraps that are destined for land fill and re-processes them into usable meters of fabric containing NO pvc. It is dry clean only.

Lining is a sea-green poly cotton

Contains bill and card holder. 

Great for walking, fishing, gardening or any practical use where you need your arms free.

Fastens at side with side release buckle and strong strap with a slide glide for quick adjustment of size.

Can also been worn across the shoulder as a mail bag at straps full length (approx 125cm)

The combination of my illustration and bag design makes this item completely unique, you will not find this anywhere else.

name: Aztec feather headdress with reflective neon appliqué and gold elastic band
description:
Aztec warrior princess, this is how i would describe this show stopping headdress.

The band is made from a woven orange braid, with green, lilac and blue colours. The feathers are a giant pad on one side, including rooster, pheasant and full hackle feathers. The particularly stunning characteristic of these feathers is their buoyancy. They have a real movement to them, whether it be mimicking your own movements or them dancing freely with the touch from the wind. I have also hand dyed and curled goose biots to create an extra texture in the centre piece of these soft feathers. The whole thing is finished off with an urban contrast of a neon reflective geometric appliqué. 

This is then put together onto a super soft backing and fits most heads because of the elastic back. Approx 56cm around the top of you head, above the eyebrows and ears.

It features a number of beautifully dyed and natural feathers.

This is a completely unique item designed and created by me Beksie in the uk.

Perfect for festivals, parties dressing up and being a show stopper.

Bag also available @ https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/155752889/chestnut-brown-wax-cotton-bumbag-bag

name: Hand ombre dyed feather headdress Tropical Bird of Paradise
description:
I have hand dyed each single feather to create this stunning, head turning unique headdress.

A tropical bird of paradise, contrasting citrus carnival colours.

Each feather is two colours, ombre / dipped dyed, Lime and magenta, turquoise and lemon and turquoise and lime, the ribbons are cerise, gold and yellow.

The main fan is made up of top quality goose feathers, the centre is a soft plume of hackle feathers, bound together with satin ribbon, all backed onto a super soft black felt for comfort. it is attached around the head with two strands of round gold metallic elastic.

The full width of the fan is 35cm in span and approximately 20cm tall, this is a large but spectacularly beautiful headpiece. There are approx 50 feathers in this headdress.

I have a small head of 21 inches, it fits me very comfortably but also stretches perfectly for larger sized heads, if you have any doubts please convo me, im sure i can help.

name: Hand ombre dyed feather headdress Petrol as seen in TopShop boutique Oxford Street London UK
description:
I have hand dyed each single feather to create this stunning, head turning unique headdress.

An iridescent petrol bird of paradise, layering multiple shades of blues, greens purples and greys.

Each feather is two colours, ombre / dipped dyed, Emerald and ultra marine, emerald and purple, goose feathers purple and ultra marine, purple and emerald full hackle, the ribbons are purple, blue and teal.

The main fan is made up of top quality goose feathers, the centre is a soft plume of hackle feathers, bound together with satin ribbon, all backed onto a super soft black felt for comfort. it is attached around the head with two strands of round gold metallic elastic.

The full width of the fan is 35cm in span and approximately 20cm tall, this is a large but spectacularly beautiful headpiece. There are approx 50 feathers in this headdress.

I have a small head of 21 inches, it fits me very comfortably but also stretches perfectly for larger sized heads, if you have any doubts please convo me, im sure i can help.

Tropical bird of paradise headdress also available

name: Floral headband rose crown Peaches and cream Rose and three coloured ranunculus. flower headdress
description:
A beautiful headpiece for frolicking in the meadows.

This band features a classic and sophisticated contrast of a large aricot coloured rose, three pink ranunculus spray, the petals on these flowers are beautifully delicate. Wild rose, peach branch. Made from artificial silk flowers.

Wrapped in a ballet pink satin ribbon around a silver tiara base, this is comfy and a lot lighter than a fresh flower garland, plus you can take it home with you time and time again.

These headbands are incredible feminine, unique and sophisticated as well as stylish and a funky alternative...it really depends what you wear it with. Great for weddings and festival fun!!

I have plenty of other designs to feast your eyes upon and multiple orders with shipping savings for bridesmaids or hen do's are easy to arrange, just convo me with any questions.

Chestnut brown wax cotton Bumbag available with brass popper strap 

or embroidered strap

I have invested in new packaging to ship these bands. They are small cardboard boxes to protect the beautiful flowers and leaves.

name: Floral headband or garland Large Pink Rose & Ivory scabiosa spary.
description:
A beautiful headpiece for frolicking in the meadows.

This band features a classic and sophisticated contrast of a large candy floss pink and a spray of Ivory scabiosa's flanked by forest green rose leaves. Made from artificial silk flowers.

Wrapped in mint green satin ribbon around a silver tiara base, this is comfy and a lot lighter than a fresh flower garland, plus you can take it home with you time and time again.

These headbands are incredible feminine, unique and sophisticated as well as stylish and a funky alternative...it really depends what you wear it with. Great for weddings and festival fun!!

I have plenty of other designs to feast your eyes upon and multiple orders with shipping savings for bridesmaids or hen do's are easy to arrange, just convo me with any questions.

I have invested in new packaging to ship these bands. They are small cardboard boxes to protect the beautiful flowers and leaves.

name: Pink and leopard print Bumbag, bag, fanny pack
description:
Pink and leopard print cotton bag with gold piping

Hot pink YKK gold metal zips.

This bag is made from polycotton so is fully washable

Two compartments. One front pocket. Main pocket also contains bill and card holder. 

Perfect for carrying all of your belongings, still being able to dance and safe from wet weather...a must have this festival season!

Also great for walking, fishing, gardening or any practical use where you need your arms free.

Fastens at side with side release buckle and strong strap with a slide glide for quick adjustment of size.

Bag: Approx 15" (38cm) at longest length (main pocket 11" Black and brass YKK zipper)

Approx 8.5" (21.5cm) High

Approx 5" (12.5cm) Depth at widest which is the top of the bag

Small pocket on front has 7" black YKK zipper

Can also been worn across the shoulder as a mail bag at straps full length (approx 125cm)

PLEASE NOTE IF YOU ARE CHOOSING CUTOMS FABRICS ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR CONVOS AND MAKING THANK YOU

name: Shell pattern 100% African wax cotton fabric. Rust Red metal zips. Bumbag fanny pack splash proof
description:
African Wax cotton Festival hip bag.

Splash proof cotton, to not wash to retain protective layer, re-wax with wear.

Gold teethed YKK metal zips, excellant quality, strong and durable. these are rust red in colour.

This design has a combination of zesty colours, lime green, orange and a royal blue and rust colour body. The design is made using a batik wax dying method, featuring inspiration from nature contrasted with intricate pattern work it also features gold metallic piping. The lining is a lime green poly cotton.

Two compartments. One front pocket. Main pocket also contains bill and card holder.

Perfect for carrying all of your belongings, still being able to dance and safe from wet weather...a must have this festival season!

Also great for walking, fishing, gardening or any practical use where you need your arms free.

Fastened with a side release buckle and sturdy webbing strap, with a slide glide to make this bag adjustable, neat and for almost anybody! Stitched with embroidered intricate design down the center of the strap in green. Which is another reason why it is completely unique.

Can also been worn across the shoulder as a mail bag at straps full length (approx 125cm)

The waxed finish provides a protective layer to the cotton. This prevents the fabric getting damaged by water. If you wash this fabric, the protective layer is washed away with it. You can wash them, but you would need to re-wax the product to achieve the same level of quality.

Testimonials: 

Incredible item - not to mention that its great quality and beautifully packaged on arrival. Will definitely buy from this seller again

The best bag I've seen. Hand made, big, confortable and wonderful. thanks

great seller, great products!!!
